TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Twan_nokan, title = Twan_nokan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twan_nokan} }

S.FORM: alang Twan nokan ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 88 buwan, 286 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 92% kyan ku 262 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 8% kyan ku 24 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 85%, Amis 3%, Bunun 2%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Twan nokan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Twan nokan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Twan nokan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Twan nokan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'llaw na Twan nokan hya' ga Zihing. tay 'zil na Twan nokan hya' ga Saruc. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Twan nokan ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 88 bowan, 286 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 92% kyan ko 262 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 8% kyan ko 24 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 85%, Amis 3%, Bonon 2%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Twan nokan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Twan nokan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Twan nokan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Twan nokan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'llaw na Twan nokan hya' ga Zihing. tay 'zil na Twan nokan hya' ga Saroc. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
